00016 #ifndef BT_SIMULATION_ISLAND_MANAGER_MT_H
00017 #define BT_SIMULATION_ISLAND_MANAGER_MT_H
00018 
00019 #include "BulletCollision/CollisionDispatch/btSimulationIslandManager.h"
00020 
00021 class btTypedConstraint;
00022 
00023 
00033 class btSimulationIslandManagerMt : public btSimulationIslandManager
00034 {
00035 public:
00036     struct Island
00037     {
00038         // a simulation island consisting of bodies, manifolds and constraints,
00039         // to be passed into a constraint solver.
00040         btAlignedObjectArray<btCollisionObject*> bodyArray;
00041         btAlignedObjectArray<btPersistentManifold*> manifoldArray;
00042         btAlignedObjectArray<btTypedConstraint*> constraintArray;
00043         int id;  // island id
00044         bool isSleeping;
00045 
00046         void append( const Island& other );  // add bodies, manifolds, constraints to my own
00047     };
00048     struct      IslandCallback
00049     {
00050         virtual ~IslandCallback() {};
00051 
00052         virtual void processIsland( btCollisionObject** bodies,
00053                                     int numBodies,
00054                                     btPersistentManifold** manifolds,
00055                                     int numManifolds,
00056                                     btTypedConstraint** constraints,
00057                                     int numConstraints,
00058                                     int islandId
00059                                     ) = 0;
00060     };
00061     typedef void( *IslandDispatchFunc ) ( btAlignedObjectArray<Island*>* islands, IslandCallback* callback );
00062     static void serialIslandDispatch( btAlignedObjectArray<Island*>* islandsPtr, IslandCallback* callback );
00063     static void parallelIslandDispatch( btAlignedObjectArray<Island*>* islandsPtr, IslandCallback* callback );
00064 protected:
00065     btAlignedObjectArray<Island*> m_allocatedIslands;  // owner of all Islands
00066     btAlignedObjectArray<Island*> m_activeIslands;  // islands actively in use
00067     btAlignedObjectArray<Island*> m_freeIslands;  // islands ready to be reused
00068     btAlignedObjectArray<Island*> m_lookupIslandFromId;  // big lookup table to map islandId to Island pointer
00069     Island* m_batchIsland;
00070     int m_minimumSolverBatchSize;
00071     int m_batchIslandMinBodyCount;
00072     IslandDispatchFunc m_islandDispatch;
00073 
00074     Island* getIsland( int id );
00075     virtual Island* allocateIsland( int id, int numBodies );
00076     virtual void initIslandPools();
00077     virtual void addBodiesToIslands( btCollisionWorld* collisionWorld );
00078     virtual void addManifoldsToIslands( btDispatcher* dispatcher );
00079     virtual void addConstraintsToIslands( btAlignedObjectArray<btTypedConstraint*>& constraints );
00080     virtual void mergeIslands();
00081         
00082 public:
00083         btSimulationIslandManagerMt();
00084         virtual ~btSimulationIslandManagerMt();
00085 
00086     virtual void buildAndProcessIslands( btDispatcher* dispatcher, btCollisionWorld* collisionWorld, btAlignedObjectArray<btTypedConstraint*>& constraints, IslandCallback* callback );
00087 
00088         virtual void buildIslands(btDispatcher* dispatcher,btCollisionWorld* colWorld);
00089 
00090     int getMinimumSolverBatchSize() const
00091     {
00092         return m_minimumSolverBatchSize;
00093     }
00094     void setMinimumSolverBatchSize( int sz )
00095     {
00096         m_minimumSolverBatchSize = sz;
00097     }
00098     IslandDispatchFunc getIslandDispatchFunction() const
00099     {
00100         return m_islandDispatch;
00101     }
00102     // allow users to set their own dispatch function for multithreaded dispatch
00103     void setIslandDispatchFunction( IslandDispatchFunc func )
00104     {
00105         m_islandDispatch = func;
00106     }
00107 };
00108 
00109 #endif //BT_SIMULATION_ISLAND_MANAGER_H
